data.text:
Everything was good, location (not far from flamingo sanctuary), restaurants, swimming pool, room cleaning (Seherul was always kind), breakfasts and other services. 

How to become better?
Laundry service and charger adapters - it will be better if the reception staff could help with that and not just send to the nearest shop ☺️ to buy adapter or detergents. If you are ok with that - just a reminder to not forget to buy everything in advance or take with you.
data.title: Double tree Dubai

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Anna M,

Thank you for choosing the DoubleTree by Hilton, Al Jadaf and for taking the time to offer your feedback. We are delighted to know that you enjoyed your visit, and we hope to see you again on a future visit to Dubai.

Your comments on the travel adaptors and washing detergents have been noted and shared with the concerned section heads for review.

Kind Regards,
Cruz D'silva
Rooms Division Manager
owner_response.author: Cruz Dsilva

data.text:
The stay was perfect
The rooms were very confortable and thé staff very friendly.
Special thanks to Mohamed, Fatma and Usama working at the reception desk.
It has been a pleasure to stay there and WE will Come back for sure.
Very nice place ti stay, and Iftar awesome.
data.title: Very great experience

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear 890gaellel,

Thank you for choosing to stay at DoubleTree by Hilton, Al Jadaf and for taking the time to leave us a 5-star review.

We are very grateful for your generous feedback, especially the positive comments you've given our team members, Mohamed, Fatma and Usama. We're delighted that they have exceeded your expectations.

It was lovely having you with us, and we look forward to welcoming you back soon.

Kind Regards,
Cruz D'silva
Rooms Division Manager
owner_response.author: Cruz Dsilva

data.text: I stayed at the DoubleTree hotel jaddaf and had a wonderful experience. The staff, especially Zaki, was helpful and friendly .thank you zaki and all the team and the managment ,i surprised also that he is speaking russian also ,we are coming to stay there soon.
data.title: Thank you Mr Zaki

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Departure36888494787,

Thank you for the wonderful 5-star review! It's great to know that you had an unforgettable stay.

We enjoyed reading all of the positive comments you have provided and would like to thank you for sharing your impressions of your experience at DoubleTree by Hilton, Al Jadaf. We completely agree, Zaki is truly a gem to have on our team!

It was a pleasure having you with us, and we look forward to welcoming you again in the near future.

Kind Regards,
Cruz D'silva
Rooms Division Manager
owner_response.author: Cruz Dsilva

data.text:
We stayed 6 nights at Doubletree Al jadaf. It's pleasant stay. Hotel was really good, neat & clean. 
Breakfast little dispointing with less induan options. Otherwise everything was good. Location also very good.

With good indian hotels nearby. Hotel has roof top small swimming pool.  Felt little congested.
data.title: Double tree al jadaf

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Venture23552011019,

Thank you for choosing the DoubleTree by Hilton, Al Jadaf and for taking the time to offer your feedback. We are delighted to know that you enjoyed your visit, and we hope to see you again on a future visit to Dubai. 

Your feedback on our breakfast offerings have been shared with our culinary head for further review. 

Kind Regards,
Cruz D'silva
Rooms Division Manager

data.text:
unfortunately, the pillow smells bad like it was not changed at all used by previous people.
Although the staffs are nicest.
the breakfast buffet i should say 4/10.

i suggest to improve the foods adding some more options. (bacon etc.)

rest are okay.
data.title: Feedback 101

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Coastal00903055749,

We apologize for the shortcomings you have experienced during your stay with us, particularly regarding the bed linen. Rest assured that your feedback has been escalated and the relevant department is already taking the necessary actions to address your concerns.

Your comments on the breakfast offering have been shared with our executive chef for further review. 

All of us at DoubleTree by Hilton, Al Jadaf appreciate an opportunity to make things right in the future and hope to welcome you back soon.

Kind Regards,
Cruz D'silva
Rooms Division Manager
owner_response.author: Cruz Dsilva
